item.description:
I've done this before and it's a lot of fun. In Bristol, at Fuji, they have a "Samurai" package for $26.95/each, where you get apps/sushi, hibachi, dessert and all you can drink for house beer, wine and sake. Usually you spend MUCH more for hibachi if you do a drink and a meal, not to mention apps or a combo meal.

 

So here are the details: Minimum guests required is 10. And if we do it on a Friday it must be after 8pm, so I'll set the reservation for 8:30.

Your choice of a Hibachi Entree: Steak, Salmon, Scallop, Shrimp, Chicken, Swordfish, Pork, or Vegetable.

Complete dinner served with 2 shrimp, soup, salad, vegetable, fried rice, white rice or noodles

Your choice of 3 appetizers (per 10 people) from list: Shumai, Gyoza, Green Gyoza, Hurmaki, Edamame Coconut shrimp,Beef Negimaki,Fried Cheese Dumpling.

Your choice of 2 rolls (per 10 people) from list: California, Tuna,Salmon, Spicy Tuna, Spicy Salmon, Yellowtail, Spicy California, Spicy Shrimp, New York, Philadelphia, Boston, Alaska.

BAR: Unlimited BEER, WINE, HOT SAKE AND SODA. (Party lasts for 2 hours)

Dessert: Vanilla, chocolate or green tea ice cream, and hot green tea.

 

WHAT YOU NEED TO KNOW:

We'll round up to $34 per person to include tax and tip. Bring cash. We'll plan something fun for afterwards. If I do not get enough RSVPs by December 7th, we will just go as a group and not do the party deal.
item.name: Hibachi Party (must get 10 RSVPs to get party deal)
